_description: On the Wound in the Side of Christ — two quatrains (abab)

BLAru286.First Lines:
Ihesus woundes so wideben welles of lif to þe
                    goode…
BLAru286.Last Lines:
…Bowe þu down to þe brinke& mekely taste of
                    þe welle
